div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1126 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1904 Burial: c. 110 B.C. Contents: 20 AE. In burial Panticapaeum: 11 AE (as BMC 41 [6]; Minns, pl. 6, 14 [5]) Unc.: 9 AE Disposition: museum material lost during war Shkorpil, IAK 25 (1907), p. 65, no. 213
